name: Talk to Who?
description:
Talk to Who? is a game-simulation that helps reinforce what we try to teach kids every day: don't answer the door to strangers, create a password with your family to use during emergencies, calling the police, etc.

Would your kid know what to do?

This is in development, so if you like it leave your thoughts (;

Check the game trailer here!

Controls: click on top a object to move towards it, move the mouse right-left to look around the room. Interacting with object is also click based.

Team: Kelle Lima, Brian Alexander, Bharat Gudihal, Chelsey Thompson, Damon Heagren, and Qinglin Mao.
